author: pderop
msg: Re added the DependencyManager.setThreadPool method which is sometimes useful, especially when writing integration tests.
Fixed bug in ComponentScheduler, where threadpool registered by a management agent (using the DM api) was not correctly

author: cziegeler
msg: FELIX-4545 : Implement Servlet Context Helper. Apply patch from Dominique Pfister

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-5904: add tests for segment/gen inflation, fix gen inflation (it always parsed gen of 0), fix off-by-one in gen-inflation (was starting at 2 instead of 1), add robustness to trash files we might be looking at, add minor restriction to segment suffix names so we can always parse generations correctly from them
